name: Nano X
longDescription: Reebok Nano X features a durable Flexweave upper for multi-directional support, an EVA midsole for cushioning, and a rubber outsole for maximum traction during high-intensity workouts.

name: Classic Leather
longDescription: Reebok Classic Leather combines a full-grain leather upper with a cushioned EVA midsole and a durable rubber outsole, delivering timeless style and everyday comfort.

name: Club C 85
longDescription: Club C 85 features a leather upper with tonal stitching, a low-cut silhouette, and a cushioned insole for that perfect blend of vintage style and modern comfort.

name: Zig Kinetica
longDescription: Zig Kinetica features a Zig Energy Shell and Floatride Fuel midsole for explosive energy return, with a breathable mesh upper and rubber pods for enhanced grip.

name: Floatride Energy
longDescription: Floatride Energy combines a Flexweave upper with Floatride Energy foam for a responsive, lightweight ride—perfect for long-distance running and daily training.

name: Legacy Lifter
longDescription: Legacy Lifter offers a high-density midsole, firm outsole, and adjustable straps to provide maximum stability and support during heavy lifts and squats.

name: Axelion
longDescription: Axelion features a lightweight mesh upper, sculpted heel clip, and Floatride Energy foam for versatile gym workouts and cardio sessions.

name: Harmon Run
longDescription: Harmon Run offers a seamless mesh upper, EVA midsole cushioning, and rubber outsole for reliable traction—ideal for daily jogs and casual runs.

name: Princess
longDescription: Reebok Princess features a sleek leather upper, metallic 3D logo, and cushioned midsole, providing a chic, comfortable shoe for everyday wear.

name: Double Handle
longDescription: Double Handle combines a leather and mesh upper, molded sockliner, and chunky outsole for a fashion-forward look with everyday comfort.
